channel.title: Rust on Daniel Dia's Personal Website
channel.description: Recent content in Rust on Daniel Dia's Personal Website

item.title: Project 3 â€“ TRNG-PassGen: A Hardware-Based Cryptographically Secure Password Generator
item.description: A full-stack, end-to-end system for generating cryptographically secure passwords based on true physical randomness, designed to be resilient against quantum computing threats.

item.title: DynamiXplore: A High-Performance Framework for Dynamical Systems
item.description: A Python-first toolkit with a high-performance Rust core for the advanced simulation and analysis of complex dynamical systems, including nonsmooth and chaotic phenomena.
